Title: Relates to health equity, affordability and reform
Summary: Relates to the basic health program; permits a person or an eligible small group to purchase coverage from a basic health plan on behalf of an individual and any qualified dependents through the basic health program buy-in as long as the individual and any qualified dependents otherwise meet certain eligibility requirements (Part A); relates to consumer protection from health care costs (Part B).
LawCode: Amd §369-gg, Soc Serv L; rpld & add Art 6 §§601 - 604, Fin Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the basic health program (Part A); and to amend the financial services law, in relation to consumer protection from health care costs; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto (Part B)
